name: Maya's Perfect Pesto Pasta Salad
author: mpkneip
summary: My 10-year-old daughter Maya and I created this easy but delicious pasta salad, featuring her favorite pesto flavors. This salad is great as the center of a light dinner, or as a side dish.
ingredients: ½ cup finely diced red onion
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook fusilli in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes
Combine basil, Parmesan cheese, pine nuts, oil, and garlic in a food processor; blend to make pesto
Toss pasta with pesto and mix in red onion, radicchio, and mayonnaise
Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving
